main event: Citizen reported sighting of round objects, the size of baseballs, rapidly disappearing into haze on the horizon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 6 seconds., The objects were described as white and round., The report suggested all characteristics aligned with meteors but noted insufficient data for evaluation., The observation was conducted with ground visual and binoculars., This report is part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program for investigating UFOs.
